Package com.tloj.game.entities

Class Boss

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
com.tloj.game.entities.Mob
com.tloj.game.entities.Boss
Direct Known Subclasses:
EvenBoss, FlyingBoss, HalverBoss
public abstract class Boss extends Mob
Abstract class to represent the Boss class in the game. Bosses are special Mobs with higher health, attack and defense points and special abilities to challenge the player.
See Also:
